name: We got a cat in the cockpit
name_original: We got a cat in the cockpit
description:
Shoot the very evil good looking robots and don't crash the very rare and priceless rental spaceship which comes with awesome probabillity guns.

Good luck and don't get stressed.

The Team

Jesper Hoff (Programmer)
Johs Duvig (Programmer)
Michael Kristiansen (3D artist)
Peter Kongsgaard (Programmer)
Robin Theilade (Programmer)
Søren Kongsgaard (3D artist)

Guest

Gray Young (Voice acting)
